page.title: 16LIFE STYLES
page.content: The people who live and work in our area are very few and are mainly farmers or farm workers. Most people commuters who work in either surrounding towns or in London. The good transport links _ the M1, A5 and near by railways make this an attractive area. The result has been that country cottages have beenn brought, modernised and extended so that today they are very valuable. Many of these people are wealthy, the houses have land on which they keep a horse and other animals an example of this is Bylands which has seven acres on which they keep 2 dogs, 5 horses, guinea fowl, geese, a cow and 50 ducks.
